Class EventQueue

extends Object
    Processes MIWT events.

    FIXME: move the EventQueue into the MIWTSession.

    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • clearPendingEvents

        public static void clearPendingEvents()
        Clear any pending events.

      • clearRequestResponse

        public static void clearRequestResponse()
        Clear the request and response for this thread.

      • fireEvents

        public static void fireEvents()
                       throws EventQueueException
        Fire the events in the current thread's queue. If an exception occurs all remaining events are discarded. If holdEvents() has been called, no action is taken.
        Throws:
        EventQueueException - if an exception occurs.

      • fireEventsAndLog

        public static boolean fireEventsAndLog()
        Fire the events in the current thread's queue. If an exception occurs all remaining events are discarded and the exception is logged. If holdEvents() has been called, no action is taken.
        Returns:
        true if all events were fired sucessfully, false if an exception occurred and was logged.

      • getPendingEventsString

        public static String getPendingEventsString()
        Get a string representation of the pending events.
        Returns:
        String.

      • holdEvents

        public static boolean holdEvents()
        Prevent events from firing. Nesting this method is supported. Multiple calls to this method require the same number of calls to releaseEvents() to allow events to be fired. This method is for internal use, if you use it and something breaks, don't file a bug.
        Returns:
        true if before this call events could fire, false if events were already held.

      • isEventPending

        public static boolean isEventPending()
        Determines if an event is pending in the queue.
        Returns:
        true if an event is pending.

      • queue

        public static void queue(EventQueueElement el)
        Queue an event.
        Parameters:
        el - the element.

      • releaseEvents

        public static boolean releaseEvents()
        Allow events to fire, reverses the effect of holdEvents(). This method is for internal use, if you use it and something breaks, don't file a bug.
        Returns:
        true if events can now be fired, false if events still cannot be fired.

      • setRequestResponse

        public static void setRequestResponse(net.proteusframework.internet.http.Request request,
                      net.proteusframework.internet.http.Response response)
        Set the request and response for this thread.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the resoonse.

      • validate

        public static void validate(Component com)
        Validate the given component.
        Parameters:
        com - the component.
